name: feedpon
description: The feed reader to change the world

scripts.build: npm run-script browserify && npm run-script uglify
scripts.app-browserify: browserify src/js/app.js --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx ] --plugin [ tsify --target ES6 --jsx react --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/app.js
scripts.app-watchify: watchify src/js/app.js --verbose --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx ] --plugin [ tsify --target ES6 --jsx react --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/app.js
scripts.worker-browserify: browserify src/js/worker.ts --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx ] --plugin [ tsify --target ES6 --jsx react --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/worker.js
scripts.worker-watchify: watchify src/js/worker.ts --verbose --ignore crypto --transform [ babelify --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx ] --plugin [ tsify --target ES6 --jsx react --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata ] --outfile public/worker.js

author: Shota Nozaki
